714960.name: Exorcism of the Legion (Last Rites) DELISTED
714960.description:
Exorcism of the Legion (Last Rites) - Chapter 2: Idle Hands

In Chapter 2, your task is to visit Lucie Moss, a mentally ill school teacher whose dangerous flirtations with the occult exposed her to a malicious entity intent on twisting her mind and devouring her soul.

Requires Chapter 1, available here

Exorcism of the Legion (Last Rites) is a fully interactive, multi-chapter story set in the world created by horror maestro William Peter Blatty. Delve deep into the heart of the supernatural as you learn the trade of demonic exorcism and uncover secrets leading you towards a final confrontation with your darkest, most hidden fears. The Exorcist: Legion VR is part investigation, part exorcism... and all horror. Is your willpower strong enough?

Developed from the ground up for HTC Vive and Oculus, Exorcism of the Legion (Last Rites) features support for tracked controllers as well as “blink” and “free roam” locomotion options and allows you to change them within the game to give you the most from your experience.

  • Multiple episodes, each featuring a different demonic entity. Buy each subsequent chapter from within the experience and face a new demon using a different weapon.

  • Each exorcism is based on a real case. Realistic, sinister and completely immersive environments hide rich story clues and a variety of unique secrets.

  • Find and use a several trademark exorcism tools as well as hidden “artifacts” that aid you on your quest.

  • Receive cryptic messages from a mysterious stranger who seems to know your every move.

  • Return to the safety of your office at the end of every chapter to assess your performance and continue the story.

  • Each chapter runs approx. 20-25 minutes, allowing you to complete a full exorcism in one session. Replay each chapter for additional secrets, achievements and performance and locate a variety of Easter eggs.
